author: Phil
content:

author: Brian J English
content: Suicidal. But at least you’re hammered when the commuter ferry slices the boat in half and sends you to the bottom.

author: Phil
content:
Good luck!
Soon as it sinks, panic!

author: Willy
content: That looks like fun, I just wonder if any of the human power also runs the refrigerant pump for the cooler. Or is that part solar powered?
